FuncDef:
The test-flow command binds NQA test flows to a test instance on an initiator.
The undo nqa test-flow command deletes the bindings between NQA test flows and a test instance.
By default, no NQA test flows are bound to a test instance.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of an NQA test flow.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 65535.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
A test service instance is configured after the service flow characteristics, bandwidth profile, SAC are configured on an initiator of an Ethernet service activation test. To bound NQA test flows to the test service instance, run the test-flow command.
Precautions
This command is only run for an Ethernet service activation test instance.
